pr_title: Document failure scenarios for Elasticsearch connector

timeline.message: Document failure scenarios for Elasticsearch connector

timeline.bodyText: Maybe use relative link so that it works in non-production environments, too?
timeline.author: vladoschreiner
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1154,7 +1154,8 @@ compile 'com.hazelcast.jet:hazelcast-jet-elasticsearch-7:{jet-version}'
 > version of Elasticsearch. The connector API is the same between
 > different versions, apart from a few minor differences where we
 > surface the API of Elasticsearch client. See the JavaDoc for any
-> such differences.
+> such differences. The jars are available as separate downloads on the
+> [download page](https://jet-start.sh/download) or in Maven Central.

timeline.message: Use relative link to download page
